availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Hatton (Bath County, Kentucky, farm hand and pvt 24th KY Inf (USA))

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier. Montgomery County, Kentucky, native. Son of Marcus Hatton and Mary Hatton. Married to Mary Warren Hatton in Bath County in May 1859. Resident of Bath County in 1850. Farmhand in Bath County in 1860. Served in the 24th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from December 31, 1861, to January 31, 1865.
